phrases.phrase: 만약 안 맞으면 바꿀 수 있나요?
meanings: 옷가게에서 Can I return it if it doesn't fit?
실용회화-전화 통화중에 Can you give me your phone number just to be on the safe side?

vlive.korean: 만약 그때로 돌아갈 수 있다면 돌아가고 싶어? If you can go back then, do you want to go back? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: If you can go back then, do you want to go back?

vlive.korean: 형은 만약에 학교 다녔으면 한 몇 등 정도 했을 것 같아? If you went to school... What do you think of your rank? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🍫🍫🍫🍫🍫
vlive.english: If you went to school... What do you think of your rank?

vlive.korean: 만약에 한다면 어떤 그림 그려져? What do you think it will be? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 17. 2라운드 진출 전! 갑분 멤버 교체 위기? 새롭게 영입된 멤버는 누구?
vlive.english: What do you think it will be?

vlive.korean: 만약에 내가 진짜 싫어지면 어떡하지? The singer asks, "What if you don't like me?" 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 연휴 마지막날! 홍모닝👋🥰
vlive.english: The singer asks, "What if you don't like me?"

vlive.korean: 이게 막 이게 만약에 한 분만 잠깐만 오시면 안 돼? 누구... Can one person come? Someone... 듣기 View video KIM JAEJOONG : [LIVE] 내일은 재중이와 콘서트에서 만나는 날💛

examples.korean: If untreated, the illness can become severe. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만약 치료를 안 받으면 병이 심해질 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If untreated, the illness can become severe. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: But supposing he sees us? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하지만 만약 그가 우리를 본다면 (어쩌지)? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: But supposing he sees us? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Suppose him dead—what then? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만약[가령] 그가 죽었다고 쳐요, 그럼 어떻게 하죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Suppose him dead—what then? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If this gets out there’ll be trouble. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만약 이것이 알려지면 곤란해질 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If this gets out there’ll be trouble. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If my maths is / are right, the answer is 142. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만약 내 계산이 맞다면 그 답은 142이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If my maths is / are right, the answer is 142. Add to Wordbook
